job description:
Description:

As the Senior Manager of Application Services team, you will be responsible for a team of software engineers who support the existing Life Science Cloud software and for transitioning the code base to micro service architecture.

Responsibilities:
  • Work closely with Product Management to understand the requirements for enhancing existing SASS product and for creating new micro services
  • Become a domain expert for the requirements and implementation
  • Be an individual contributor by writing technical specifications and coding sections of the software
  • Work closely with the Senior Director of Application Development to evolve the architecture of these modules
  • Accurately estimate tasks and provide regular status updates as part of our scrum-based, Agile development process
  • Deliver the modules as components to the larger software releases
  • Work closely with the Application Architect to implement future systems
Technical Skills
  • 5+ year of Management Expierence
  • Strong Java coding skills
  • Scala experience or experience with other functional languages
  • Expertise in building and supporting large, enterprise-scale, mission-critical business applications
  • Ability to debug complex, distributed systems
  • Passionate about learning new technologies
  • Embraces testing philosophies and practices
  • Expertise with Amazon Web Services
  • Experience integrating with third-party systems using REST APIs and SOAP
  • Exposure to micro-service architectures
  • Understanding of the supply-chain and B2B interactions
  • Experience with modern UI frameworks a plus
Project Management Skills
  • Develop complex systems using Agile methodologies in a fast-paced environment
  • Ability to develop systems incrementally so that they can be demoed and tested on an on-going basis
  • Demonstrated track record to interact and negotiate with Product Management
  • Track-record for delivering software projects on-time and with few defects
Note: To apply for this job, submit your application by clicking on the Apply Now button on this page
